snippet: Recent Off Broadway productions of the musical “Once” and the play “Sons of the Prophet” won top honors at the presentation of the 27th annual Lucille Lortel Awards.
abstract: Recent Off Broadway productions of the musical “Once” and the play “Sons of the Prophet” won top honors at the presentation of the 27th annual Lucille Lortel Awards.

headline.main: 'Once' and 'Sons of the Prophet' Win Smaller-Show Honors
